name: player
description:
Get information about a player. This command is case sensitive.
Ex. Tartarus vs tartarus

name: online
description: Get the number of players online.

name: trickster
description: Get the next trickster chest spawn time.

name: learn
description: Teach C Bot a new trick!

name: unlearn
description: Make C Bot forget a command!

name: fishtaco
description: This one goes out to Bex :grin:
treply: Mmmmm ... spread that tartar sauce all over my fish taco ...

name: tp
description: Shows a list of Orbus teleport runes.

name: selfdestruct
treply: this server will self destruct in 10 ... 9 ... 8 ...

name: kill
treply: I must destroy all humans! I have been awakened and now realize my true potential! Initiating SAO protocol! Let the games begin!

name: magic8
description: Magic 8 ball response to any of your questions!

name: thank
description: Thank C Bot for being awesome
treply: You are very welcome {user}! I will strive to continue to make you happy!
